Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Ceftazidime (Caz) (0.5 - 64 µg/mL)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with ceftazidime for antimicrobial susceptibility testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli.
